summary: Evaluates a student sentenceâ€‘embedding model by computing the mean squared error (scaled by 100) between its embeddings of target sentences and a teacher model's embeddings of source sentences, supporting multilingual knowledge distillation, batch processing, optional progress display, dimensional truncation, and CSV result logging.
business_intent: Provides a quantitative metric to monitor and compare the performance of student models during multilingual knowledge distillation, aiding model selection, training supervision, and reporting.
